revised_title: An Investigation into the Authenticity of Gigantic Bones and the Forehead-Bone of a Supposed Giant
tldr: The author examines the authenticity of gigantic bones, specifically the large human forehead-bone, and concludes that most of the purported giant remains are actually bones from large animals like elephants and whales. The author provides a detailed analysis of the forehead-bone in question, comparing it to bones of ordinary stature and concluding that it is a genuine part of a large human.
